To get anaccess token to consume the API on behalf of a user, use a suitable OAuth library for your platform (if you'reusing Django, for example, you might use `Fandjango <https://github.com/jgorset/fandjango>`_).Installation------------.. code:: bash $ pip install facepyContribute----------* Fork `the repository <http://github.com/jgorset/facepy>`_.* Do your thing (preferably on a feature branch).* Write a test that demonstrates that the bug was fixed or the feature works as expected.* Send a pull request and bug me until I merge it!I love you----------Johannes Gorset made this.
